lyrics:
77 contributorsxo lyricsintro
flight controllers here looking very carefully at the situation
obviously a major malfunction

verse 1
your love is bright as ever
even in the shadows
baby kiss me
before they turn the lights out
your heart is glowin
and im crashin into you
baby kiss me
before they turn the lights out
before they turn the lights out
baby love me lights out

chorus
in the darkest night hour in the darkest night hour
i search through the crowd i search through the crowd
your face is all that i see ive given you everything
baby love me lights out
baby love me lights out xo
you can turn my lights out

verse 2
we dont have forever
ooh baby daylights wastin
you better kiss me
before our time has run out
mmm yeah yeah
nobody sees what we see
theyre just hopelessly gazing oh
oh baby take me me
before they turn the lights out
before our time has run out
baby love me lights out
